title: winbank mycard
summary: All Piraeus Bank Card Offers in your Smartphone & Smartwatch!
description: Through winbank mycard App you can be informed of all the Piraeus Bank card offers from Smartphone  & Smartwatch. It provides you real-time information for discounts, loyalty programs, contests and special offers you can benefit by using Piraeus Bank cards (credit, debit, prepaid cards) for your transactions.The App is available for Android Wear Smartwatches, so you can quickly and easily view the nearby offers.With winbank mycard App you can:• View your nearest offers on a map• View all offers that are related to your own cards• Be notified when you physically approach a location where an offer exists• Select certain offers as favorites for easier access • Navigate with clear instructions to any offer location on the map• Send interesting offers via email or share them with your social friends (facebook, twitter)
descriptionHTML:
Through winbank mycard App you can be informed of all the Piraeus Bank card offers from Smartphone & Smartwatch. It provides you real-time information for discounts, loyalty programs, contests and special offers you can benefit by using Piraeus Bank cards (credit, debit, prepaid cards) for your transactions.

The App is available for Android Wear Smartwatches, so you can quickly and easily view the nearby offers.

With winbank mycard App you can:
• View your nearest offers on a map
• View all offers that are related to your own cards
• Be notified when you physically approach a location where an offer exists
• Select certain offers as favorites for easier access
• Navigate with clear instructions to any offer location on the map
• Send interesting offers via email or share them with your social friends (facebook, twitter)
comments: Όλες οι εφαρμογές το ίδιο εικονίδιο. Κουράζει και μπερδεύει. Τα ονόματα ξεκινάνε πάντα από winbank με αποτέλεσμα να έχει κάποιος 5 εφαρμογές και να μην ξέρει ποια είναι αυτή που θέλει να ανοίξει
Η εφαρμογή ωραία. Οι προσφορές ελάχιστες.
Great app! Great interface, great usability! Operates perfecr in android Wear!
